reporting-org.narrative: AICS - Italian Agency for Cooperation and Development

title.narrative: Rafforzamento resilienza popolazioni per fronteggiare l'insicurezza alimentare nel centro-nord e nel Sahel - Art 7 L. 125/2014

description.narrative: L'iniziativa intende migliorare la sicurezza alimentare e la capacità di resilienza al cambiamento climatico delle comunità vulnerabili, situate nelle regioni del Centro-nord e del Sahel del Burkina Faso, e a promuovere l'equità sociale e di genere

The initiative aims to improve food security and climate change resilience capacity of vulnerable communities, located in the central and northern regions of the Sahel of Burkina Faso, and to promote social and gender equity

participating-org.narrative: AICS - Italian Agency for Cooperation and Development

organisation.narrative: AICS - Italian Agency for Cooperation and Development

tag.narrative: By 2030, end hunger and ensure access by all people, in particular the poor and people in vulnerable situations, including infants, to safe, nutritious and sufficient food all year round
By 2030, eradicate extreme poverty for all people everywhere, currently measured as people living on less than $1.25 a day
End hunger, achieve food security and improved nutrition and promote sustainable agriculture
End poverty in all its forms everywhere
